casebody.data:
HOWES
v.
HOCKNEY. No. 353P05-4. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2006. Grady L. Balentine, Jr., Assistant Attorney General, for C. Preston Cornelius. Clarence Preston Cornelius, Pro Se. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th day of August 2005 by Plaintiff for "Appeal In Forma Pauperis to Dismiss With Prejudice Order of 11th Day of July 2005 & All of Judge Griffin Orders for Constructive Fraud and Disallow Attorney Fees: "Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of January 2006." Justice EDMUNDS recused.
